content:
https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=-2
Hi! Can Group.member.inactive be added as a parameter for search? We need to be able to pull active members from groups. I tried inactive:not=true in search and it did not work. Is there another way to do this?

@Camila Altman To propose this you can a) discuss on the implementers chat if you think it needs more discussion or b) make a Jira ticket proposing the change. Then the FHIR-I WG will discuss during a meeting.

@Eric Haas Hi Eric! Thanks for responding. Did I not do it correctly in JIRA? https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=-2
Do I need to resubmit it differently?
OK that is great. (sorry I missed that) Are you asking to add it to next weeks agenda then? The other way to create your own custom search parameters for your implementation.
@Eric Haas sure! Which one should I join? image.png
Your tracker is fine... any meeting is fine. is up to you.
